title: Marine plankton community and net primary production responding to island-trapped waves in a stratified oligotrophic ecosystem
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Zrinka Ljubešić, Hrvoje Mihanović, Antonija Matek, Maja Mucko, Eric P. Achterberg, Melissa Omand, Branka Pestorić, Davor Lučić, Hrvoje Čižmek, Barbara Čolić, Cecilia Balestra, Raffaella Casotti, Ivica Janeković, Mirko Orlić
